item.description:
Please come join me for dinner and drinks at the oldest Mom and Pops Mexican restaurnt in Boston. Ingrediants are fresh and desserts are hand made.

On the street parking available. Public transportation is C line Saint Marys and D line Fenway. If last minuet plans come up and you are unable to make it please call me on my cell phone at 617-470-4118.

group.name: Brunch & More (20/30-Somethings for brunch & more, etc...)

item.name: Dinner at Sol Azteca Restaurnt
